LanguageData.AllianceScenario.label: Alliance - A Different Story
LanguageData.AllianceScenario.description: The three of you have fled Stormwind, the human capital of Azeroth, after orcs invaded and razed it to the ground. You were barely able to board a ship and escape by sea, but have limited supplies to last your arrival in this strange, new land.
LanguageData.AllianceScenario.scenario.name: Alliance - A Different Story
LanguageData.AllianceScenario.scenario.summary: Human refugees fleeing the destroyed city of Stormwind.
